code: import{createSelector}from"reselect";var COLLECTION_ID_MAP={hats:1,sneakers:2,jackets:3,mens:5,womens:4};var selectShop=function selectShop(state){return state.shop;};export var selectCollections=createSelector([selectShop],function(shop){return shop.collections;});export var selectCollection=function selectCollection(collectionUrlParam){return createSelector([selectCollections],function(collections){return collections.find(function(collection){return collection.id===COLLECTION_ID_MAP[collectionUrlParam];});});};
